channel.title: tutorials on qri
channel.description: Recent content in tutorials on qri

item.title: Skylark Transformations
item.description: Skylark Transformations Qri (“query”) is about datasets. A transformation is a repeatable script for generating a dataset. Skylark is a scripting langauge from Google that feels a lot like python. This package implements skylark as a transformation syntax. Skylark tranformations are about as close as one can get to the full power of a programming language as a transformation syntax. Often you need this degree of control to generate a dataset.
